DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , observational , cohort study evaluate relative efficacy safety Resolute Integrity stent compare ( drug elute stent ) DES .
DOC.detailed_description: Consecutive Percutaneous Coronary Intervention patient receive Resolute Integrity stent compare concurrent Drug Eluting Stents .
DOC.criteria: Patients significant coronary artery disease receive Resolute Integrity stent . The patient guardian agrees study protocol schedule clinical followup , provide informed , write consent , approve appropriate Institutional Review Board/Ethics Committee respective clinical site . Patients mixture DESs Terminal illness life expectancy < 1 year Patients present cardiogenic shock
DOC.keyword: Coronary artery disease require drug elute stent
